Class AbandonedShip

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.adventurecard.AdventureCard
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.adventurecard.AbandonedShip
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AbandonedShip extends AdventureCard
Represents the AbandonedShip adventure card.

This card introduces a trade-off where the player loses a specified number of crew members and days in exchange for a coin reward. The card can only be resolved once per game instance.

  • lostDays: the number of days lost if the card is accepted
  • lostMembers: the number of crew members lost
  • coins: the coin reward received upon resolution
  • resolved: flag indicating whether the card has already been resolved
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • AbandonedShip

      public AbandonedShip(String id, AdventureCard.Type type, int lostDays, int lostMembers, int coins) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs an AbandonedShip card with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the card
      type - the type of the card (e.g., LEVEL1, LEVEL2, TRIAL)
      lostDays - number of days the player will lose
      lostMembers - number of crew members the player will lose
      coins - amount of coins the player gains
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is negative
